channel.title: How to fix a client on a x64 bit computer
channel.description:
This Tutorial is how to fix those annoying client crashes when you click on the screen to do something(Like move your character) on x64 bit computers!
[b]Credits[/b] Lin Moparisthebest Taharok pro banana
and
me(Code God Of Rs) For putting it all in a newbie friendly Tutorial! [b] What you need to know:[/b] How to Copy and Paste A basic understanding of computers
[u][b] Fixing the Compiler and some extra stuff for preparation of step 4[/b][/u]
Step 1)Download the latest Version of Java JDK Found here: [url=http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/widget/jdk6.jsp]http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/widget/jdk6.jsp[/url]
You need to download the ones that say "Windows" and "Windows x64" on that drop down menu!
Step 2)Once you install them You need to set the paths,Like this: Right Click on "My Computer" and click "Properties" a menu called "System" Should appear Find "Advanced System Settings"(To the left of the System Screen) and click it! Now Find "Environment Variables"
Step3)IN THE FIRST WINDOW AT THE TOP! USER VARIABLES! Click New A box with "Variable Name:" and "Variable Value:" Should appear! In Variable Name's Textbox(To the right of the name) Enter this: [code]CLASSPATH[/code] Now in Variable Value's Textbox enter this: [code]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin;%CLASSPATH%;[/code]
Now Click Ok!
Step3) Click New in user Variables once more and enter this! In Variable Name's Textbox Enter this: [code]PATH[/code]
Now in Variable Value's Textbox enter this: [code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin;[/code]
Now Click ok
Step 4) Exit out of This and go to your RS Private server CLIENT in the Run.bat(Should be something like that) Right click it and click edit
You should see [code]java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui[/code] Somewhere, Replace that line with [code]"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui[/code] [u] If you can't find this or you just can't edit it Download the Zip included in this Thread and put it in your client folder![/u]
[b]It Wouldn't hurt if the Mods would stickie this![/b] [b]It also wouldn't Hurt if the mods didn't lock this for something dumb like Double posting or leeching or whatever![/b] [b]This tutorial was written by me(Twice because the first one got deleted)[/b] [u][b][THIS TUTORIAL WAS MADE ON A Windows Vista x64 bit computer!][/b][/u] [b]Also sorry if wrong section of forums seemed like appropriate place to post this![/b]
Hoped this helped any of you having this horrible problem! If you still have trouble PM me! :D

item.description:

There is nothing wrong with the current sticky in client hacking section. In fact I found it much easier to understand.

item.title: How to fix a client on a x64 bit computer
item.dc:creator: @code_god_of_rs code god of rs
item.description:
@code_god_of_rs wrote:

This Tutorial is how to fix those annoying client crashes when you click on the screen to do something(Like move your character) on x64 bit computers!

Credits
Lin
Moparisthebest
Taharok
pro banana

and

me(Code God Of Rs) For putting it all in a newbie friendly Tutorial!

What you need to know:
How to Copy and Paste
A basic understanding of computers


Fixing the Compiler and some extra stuff for preparation of step 4

Step 1)Download the latest Version of Java JDK Found here: http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/widget/jdk6.jsp

You need to download the ones that say “Windows” and “Windows x64” on that drop down menu!

Step 2)Once you install them You need to set the paths,Like this: Right Click on “My Computer” and click “Properties” a menu called “System” Should appear Find
“Advanced System Settings”(To the left of the System Screen) and click it! Now Find “Environment Variables”

Step3)IN THE FIRST WINDOW AT THE TOP! USER VARIABLES!
Click New A box with “Variable Name:” and “Variable Value:” Should appear!
In Variable Name’s Textbox(To the right of the name) Enter this:

CLASSPATH

Now in Variable Value’s Textbox enter this:

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

Now Click Ok!

Step3)
Click New in user Variables once more and enter this!
In Variable Name’s Textbox Enter this:

PATH

Now in Variable Value’s Textbox enter this:

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin;

Now Click ok

Step 4)
Exit out of This and go to your RS Private server CLIENT in the Run.bat(Should be something like that)
Right click it and click edit

You should see java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui Somewhere, Replace that line with "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui

If you can’t find this or you just can’t edit it Download the Zip included in this Thread and put it in your client folder!

It Wouldn’t hurt if the Mods would stickie this!
It also wouldn’t Hurt if the mods didn’t lock this for something dumb like Double posting or leeching or whatever!
This tutorial was written by me(Twice because the first one got deleted)
[THIS TUTORIAL WAS MADE ON A Windows Vista x64 bit computer!]
Also sorry if wrong section of forums seemed like appropriate place to post this!

Hoped this helped any of you having this horrible problem! If you still have trouble PM me!

Read full topic
item.source: How to fix a client on a x64 bit computer
